<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="no"/> <!-- ==================================================================== This filter adds the same attribute assigned to the citation link at the end of the summary section to the matching citation link in the the summary section text ==================================================================== -->
<!-- ==================================================================== add refidx to CitationReference elements ===================================================================== -->
<xsl:template match="CitationLink | ProtocolLink"> <xsl:variable name="ref"> <xsl:value-of select="@cdr:ref"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name="refidx"> <xsl:value-of select="ancestor::SummarySection/ReferenceList/Reference[@cdr:ref=$ref]/@refidx"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- ===================================================================
Template rule used to do XML to XML transformations which copies any attribute node, or node that is child of of something ====================================================================== -->
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
